concept.title: Increasing the Ratio of Cache Hits
concept.shortdesc: The more frequently a get fails to find a valid value in the first cache and has to try a second cache, the more the overall performance is affected.

conbody.p: A common cause of misses is expiration or eviction of the entry. If you have a regionâ€™s entry expiration or eviction enabled, monitor the region and entry statistics.
If you see a high ratio of misses to hits on the entries, consider increasing the expiration times or the maximum values for eviction, if possible. See for more information.
